name: cltchitr
story:
Clutch Hitter is a baseball video game released by Sega in 1991. It was released in video arcades as well for Sega's portable Game Gear. The Japanese version of the game features players and teams from Japan's Nippon Professional Baseball league. 

The American version of the game sports a license from the Major League Baseball Players Association and has rosters composed of actual professional baseball players
